item.title: IBM Workpad z50 & NetBSD - an interesting combination
item.description: This week we look at another RISC powered notebook, this time from IBM. Although IBM did produce a line of PowerPC based Thinkpad systems, this blog is focused on a little known system called the IBM Workpad z50.
